function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cross-contamination risk due to inadequate HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased viral transmission and compromised indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Ensure greater local extraction in HVAC systems and guarantee 100% indoor and outdoor air exchange, avoid recirculation, and prioritize natural ventilation","Technologies":"Advanced local extraction systems, natural ventilation, high-efficiency filters (HEPA)","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Impact on energy consumption and investment costs","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and additional investment costs","Mitigation":"Implement energy recovery heating, consider potential certification for the features, and conduct cost-benefit analysis for supplementary investment","Technologies":"Energy recovery heating systems, certification processes, cost-benefit analysis tools","People":"Facility management, building owners, energy consultants","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Potential limitations of proposed solutions","Impact":"Limitations in the application and effectiveness of proposed solutions","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to optimize conditions for reducing viral residence time, monitor indoor air conditions, and consider additional measures for reducing viral activity","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitoring systems, research tools for viral residence time, additional measures for reducing viral activity","People":"Research teams, facility management","Owner":"Research institutions, facility management"}]}
